## host.Api.close() method

Closes the host in the native app. When being called in the native app, this action closes the modal browser window. Nothing happens if called within a browser tab.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
sdk.host.close();
```
